page.title: 04 HOME LIFE
page.content: 3. Jobs in the house tend to be sexist. 4. Girls do more than boys! (Claire and Vicki's assessment) People said that they were friendly with about 6 families. Only 8 people said they knew 10 or more families well. Families tend to sit down for one meal a day. Take Away food is popular. Nearly everyone eats out at some time. Only 3 people were vegetarians. The main age group who smoked were 22-40; over 40 smoked quite a lot but a lot less than half of the under 21's smoked. Most houses had a pet. In order they were fish, dog, cat, bird and others.
